home.p1_1: The UOWMBus website provides an information gateway for transportation for the
home.p2: The platform includes the schedule of bus routes that serve the university faculties, as well as routes connecting the city of Kastoria with nearby areas.
home.p3: Additionally, you will find information about bus departure/arrival times, along with updates on any changes or delays.
home.p4: UOWMBus is designed to offer a simple and fast experience for students, professors, and university staff, giving them the ability to easily plan their transportation.

info.p1: This website was created purely for practice and non-profit purposes!
info.p2_2: or to find more routes of the

ticket.info: Students are entitled to a reduced ticket!

notFound.p: We are sorry, but the page you are looking for may have been moved, deleted or may not exist.
